Taste the Soul of Morocco

Authentic Dining in the Heart of Rabat's Old Medina

Reserve Now View Menu

Our Story

Nestled in the historic Old Medina of Rabat, Dar El Medina offers a sanctuary of flavors and tradition. We invite you to step into a world of warm amber lights, intricate geometric patterns, and the soothing sounds of live Moroccan music.

Our kitchen celebrates the rich heritage of Moroccan cuisine, crafting dishes with love, fresh local ingredients, and age-old recipes passed down through generations. Whether you are looking for a cozy family dinner or a romantic evening, our doors are open.

Live Music
Fresh Ingredients
Authentic Vibe
